attributes.action: Northern Ireland & other British territories to decide if they want to be a part of Scotland or England
attributes.additional_details: In the event of the Scottish voting for dissolution of the union, all those populated territories aquired under the union (Northern Ireland, Turks and Caicos Islands, Falkland Islands, Pitcairn Islands and Gibraltar) should be given referendums stating whether they would rather be part of a Kingdom of England or a Kingdom of Scotland.
